Articles.Content:
is there a mod that allows you to transfer kerbals between parts on a ship without EVA'ing? i discovered that the centrifuge part from OKS aparently doesnt have a radial hatch, so now i have no way of getting my kerbals into it.

thanks ahead.

Are you referring to the ring at the bottom of this station?

(Not my pic, found it on Google, please don't yell at me ._. )

If so, I believe it has an "Emergency Escape Hatch" thingy on the outer ring that you can use to transfer them. NEVER use it to EVA them tho, as it seems to launch them, spinning very quickly away from the station

If so, I'll try to get a better screeny tonight of it

If not, please disregard this post

is there a mod that allows you to transfer kerbals between parts on a ship without EVA'ing? i discovered that the centrifuge part from OKS aparently doesnt have a radial hatch, so now i have no way of getting my kerbals into it.

thanks ahead.

Yes there is.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70161
If you have updated to the latest version of KSP, you don't need a mod. You can transfer them pretty much the same way you transfer fuel.
you still need to click the hatch to transfer. if you have crewed parts without accessible hatch you're stuck

ah, okay, thanks!

i put the wrong docking port on my ship so i could not dock, and id have to transfer crew in groups of two through a seperate command pod into the centrifuge, however i was able to access it through the hatch Slam_Jones showed.

thanks!

Yes there is.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70161

CLS is just an API to determine which modules allow crew transfer and in what directions - it does not have the actual transfer functionality itself.

OP, what you're looking for is something like Crew Manifest or Ship Manifest.
Oh that's right, my bad. Thanks for the correction.
